name: Commando Desert Strike War
description:
Commando Desert Strike War is a modern game with the best war zone game and like IGI commando mission is the best legendary figures games of shooting,
features:
• Built in detail, Excellent 3D environment
• Magnificent sound effects
• Detailed Map for pointing the position of enemies
• User Friendly GUI and controls
• Adventures of one commando against the whole army
• Best First person shooting Action game
